text: Petr Málek (; 26 November 1961 in Moravský Krumlov – 30 November 2019 in Kuwait) was a Czech sport shooter. He won the Silver Medal in skeet at the Sydney 2000 Olympic Games. He was Cyprus coach 2002–2008 and later a private coach. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Czech Republic Category:Sport shooters
title: Petr Málek
